title: Zoe is here! Discussion page.. and yeah she was indeed a true aspect in targon
body:
yeah i was right when i said she's gonna be an aspect, true aspect and not a host!

Zoe:The Aspect of Twilight

> Don't be fooled by her childish appearance—Zoe is an ancient being, a cosmic messenger of Targon. When the Aspect of Twilight appears, she warps reality. Despite all this power, she often shirks her duties in favor of blowing bubbles and playing tricks on unsuspecting mortals. One can never be sure of what she’s really aiming for... other than her own amusement.

https://pbs.twimg.com/media/DN9_5VNWAAA6M1Q.jpg

and

Cyberpop Zoe

https://pbs.twimg.com/media/DN9_9TAXUAAVEkq.jpg

reveal page: http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/featured/champion-reveal-zoe

replies.body:
"Don't be fooled by her childish appearance—Zoe is an ancient being, a cosmic messenger of Targon"
...


ಠ_ಠ
Ah yes now the r34 is not jailbait :)

It's still creepy though.
But then again she isn't innocent either.
She puts people to sleep and god knows what then.
Bill Zoeby.
RAVIOLI RAVIOLI DONT LEWD THE TARGON LOLI
https://i.imgur.com/uTEcLny.png?noredirect

Well to be fair we do need to get that legal loli.

Edit: lol damn some people here really take offense to this lol.

What is the difference between a child and a loli? Just asking.

If loli means childish looking adult women, what matters? This people are still attractive child look, which means they can be attractive to children too.

Zoe being thousands of years old doesn't change the fact she looks like a kid. It shouldn't make anyone feel less guilty IMO.

It's being attracted to more child-like features, technically.  Rounder faces, smaller stature, bigger eyes.

But Zoe acts like a child too, so I'd still say it's a no-go.

“She’s  doesn’t look a day over 12000 years old,
A baby really”{{champion:136}}
Wonder what that key on her waist is for.
imagine if its in here story page.
Another champ used to have it, but it's Zoe's now.
OMG, who might that be. _Going into detective mode right away_

Zoe's other trinkets in the splash are one of Bard's Chimes and a Moon Stone (you know that thing Nami is searching for?) just to give you an idea of Zoe's general level of power in the lore.

To her they are just shiny doodads that are fun to fiddle with.
Is Zoe related to shen in any way? Twilight homies or something?

No, just as in various cultures here on earth, the Ionians use of twilight is separate to the meaning given to it by Targonians.

In this case I think Ionia considers twilight as a time of when dark and light are in _balance_. While Targonians view it as a time of transition or _change_.
I'd like to know how she doesn't trip over all of that hair, especially being a child...
It's magic.
And a REALLY good shampoo
Definitely Timotei.
What _is_ her general level of Power? Obviously it's not {{champion:136}} levels or anything, but is she on the same level as the other aspects, or more like the Freljordian Demigod level?
WAAARGHbobo told me she is at ASol level.
I like the way she and Sol are meant to be the most powerful beings in league and the both of them have Ults that are so underwhelming and pathetic considering how powerful they are.
This is very important for me to know: Did she steal that chime from Bard or was it a gift? I’m a huge fan of Bard so, if she stole it, I’m going on a witch hunt. >:(
Either she _borrowed_ it and Bard noticed and was cool with it, or it was given to her. Zoe heralds change while Bard prevents disasters, so they probably meet from time to time.

I see what you guys did there. 

Zoe is the herald of change, and she will be released shortly after the MASSIVE rune rework.

Kudos if that was intentional:P

Question if you dont mind:

Zoe chromas are going to be a massive success (just because her base color scheme is already bright and vivid). Are we going to get these sooner or later?

I think the plan right now is to do chromas for popular skins that champs have that open themselves up to chroma packs - real world costuming or big colour blocking skins work well there. _If_ Zoe does get chromas in the future it'll be later. She's not even out yet xD
Fiddlesticks has a key around his neck, it's probably his.
actually he doesn't check his splash art

https://i.pinimg.com/736x/8d/65/da/8d65da9e73b586c494efb913053ea821--doom-classic-champions-league-of-legends.jpg

he did in his old one I guess

Edit: looking at both keys side by side it is in fact that same key. so yeah its a key fiddlesticks USED to have.
but it is on his pre-updated splash art

zoe owns the key to hell

and stole it from fiddlesticks xD
Fiddle is one of my favourite champs and I was wondering where his key got to. I'm glad we now know.

Fortunately, she isn't as mobile as I originally feared.  Her blink is her ultimate.  Her sleep trap popping out over a wall will be irritating and will also make it very hard to chase or escape her, but she doesn't look quite as annoying as I expected from her teaser.
The ult will probably be on a 15 second CD or something like that.
with no cdr??
Correct

> [{quoted}](name=Reav3,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=9I17Zwrr,comment-id=00190000000000000000,timestamp=2017-11-06T20:46:10.039+0000)
>
> Correct

Any chance you could answer one or two questions about her Q while you're here?

* What's the cooldown?
* What's the cook time?
* Does it pass through minions?

As it's her primary damage spell (or so it seems), I've been super curious about this data. Fine with waiting if I have to, but since you're around... :P

Cooldown - Can't remember the exact cooldown but it's not to bad
Cooktime - What do you mean cooktime?

It does not pass through minions, but you can cast it to the side of the minion wave in lane and then recast it to basically go around the minion wave.

If it passed through minions it would be pretty difficult for her to farm.

> [{quoted}](name=Reav3,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=9I17Zwrr,comment-id=0019000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2017-11-06T20:55:37.063+0000)
>
> Cooldown - Can't remember the exact cooldown but it's not to bad
> Cooktime - What do you mean cooktime?
> 
> It does not pass through minions, but you can cast it to the side of the minion wave in lane and then recast it to basically go around the minion wave.

Awesome. Thanks!

And yeah, I should have elaborated on cooktime. I was referring to the amount of time you can "hold" the cast at the first location you sent it before firing it off again.

Zoe is AP Riven confirmed?

Just kidding, but seriously this champ is gonna have an insane skill cap and floor.

I can't wait to master her :)

Cyberpop Zoe?
Is that name official?
Why not putting it in the Arcade line? It shares alot of design elements and makes sense with her gameplay.

I like that sci-fi vibe though, which other champs could we add to that setting?
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}
*Splatoon intensifies*

I like the style WAY more than arcade. I'm glad their delving into the sci-fi/futuristic/cute vibe, ya know? The bright colors and mellow grays are really cool looking. It's less in-your-face than the arcade line, and I'm glad!
I am glad that you are glad :)

Thank you so much! I'm really glad you took you time to reply! This comment has brought my GLADNESS to the maximum! I'm just so friggin glad, YA KNOW? I think I need to take a 12 hour nap now!!! (but really, I love this skin so much)

Ha! It's a tricky thing though, as we make more and more skins (over 800?) should we keep trying things a shade to the left or right of current thematics, or go deeper on the ones we already have? I think the answer is a bit of both.

Yup it's official, KateyKhaos confirmed on Twitter.

https://twitter.com/KateyAnthony/status/927606316981411840?ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw&ref_url=https%3A%2F%2Fdisqus.com%2Fembed%2Fcomments%2F%3Fbase%3Ddefault%26f%3Dsurrenderat20%26t_u%3Dhttp%253A%252F%252Fwww.surrenderat20.net%252F2017%252F11%252Fchampion-reveal-zoe-aspect-of-twilight.html%26t_d%3D%250AChampion%2520Reveal%253A%2520Zoe%252C%2520the%2520Aspect%2520of%2520Twilight%250A%26t_t%3D%250AChampion%2520Reveal%253A%2520Zoe%252C%2520the%2520Aspect%2520of%2520Twilight%250A%26s_o%3Ddesc%23version%3D6f48ff7efc016ebe1db52c0ed7ec35cc
She's wearing rollerblades in her skin! Instabuy!
